Package io.clonecloudstore.common.quarkus.statemachine

Class StateTransition<E extends Enum<E>>

java.lang.Object
io.clonecloudstore.common.quarkus.statemachine.StateTransition<E>
Type Parameters:
E - the enum class
public class StateTransition<E extends Enum<E>> extends Object
Transition object that joins one state and one set of acceptable following states.
